mods.abstract: The work presents an abstract composition of lines, spots and cloud-like forms which spiral outward from the center of the picture.
mods.note: Color electron print by the artist while at LSU. The isotope used for the printing was Sulphur 35. The print is in two colors -- blue and grayish brown., thus using two matrices.. The drawing for the print was done using brush and radioactive ink solution.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art

titleInfo.title: Caroline Wogan Durieux Works of Art
